subject: FROM FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
body:
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW YORK
33 LIBERTY STREET, NEW YORK, NY 10045

REF:- PAYMENT CODE: ECB/066

Attention Valued Beneficiary:  Lewis D. Noogie,
The Federal Reserve Bank of New York NY, wish to inform you that we have received your email with your receiving banking details for the transfer of your approved funds and we have as well concluded and finalized every vital arrangements concerning the swift wire transfer of your fund valued $10.5M, Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand United States dollars as instructed. 
Be advised that your banking details has been set to our Telex Computer Transfer System, for the immediate transfer of your fund $10.5m direct into your Bank Account at Latvijas Banka as soon as the required fee is received from you.

Having finalized all arrangements concerning your fund transfer, we are now waiting for you to proceed as urgent as possible and send the required $980 fee with our receiving agent bank details as listed below and get back to us with the confirmation payment slip to enable us proceed with the transfer.
Here is our receiving agent information to pay the $980 fee to enable us proceed with the transfer to your bank account.
Bank Name:  Bank of America   Bank Address:  22 Broadway New York, NY 10038 USAAccount Number:   501029493812Swift Code:       BOFAUS3NRouting Number:  026009593 Account Name:    Evelyn ConwayHome Address:   241 Glen Vista Dr Dayton NV 89403-6342 USA.
As soon as the $980.00 applicable PROCESSING/STAMP DUTY FEE  is received from you, we shall proceed with your funds transfer of $10,500.000.00 to your Latvijas Banka without delays.
We are only waiting for you to enable us proceed and complete the transfer.
Yours in service,
Mr. Jerome Powell
PRESIDENT/CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK NEW YORK
====================================================Dear Mr. Jerome Powell,
I am delighted to receive your email regarding the payment order in my favor valued at Ten million five hundred thousand United States dollars from the World Bank Office.
Here are the details you requested:
Full Name: Lewis D. NoogieAddress: 1234 Main Street, Novosibirsk, LatviaDirect Cell Mobile Phone Number: +371 12345678Receiving Bank Name: Latvijas BankaBank Address: K. Valdemāra iela 2A, Centra rajons, Rīga, LV-1050, LatviaRouting Number: LATBLV22XXXSwift Code: LATBLV22XXXAccount Number: LV12HABA0001123456789Name of Account Holder: Lewis D. NoogieOccupation: Hotel Consultant
Regarding the processing stamp duty fee, could you please provide me with more information on how I can make this payment?
Looking forward to your swift response.
Best regards,Lewis D.
Best wishes,Diana

subject: Attention Valued Beneficiary:  Lewis D. Noogie,
body:
Attention Lewis,
This is to let you know that the Federal Reserve Bank of New York have received your email with the content well noted and understood regarding the transfer of your approved funds $10,500.000.00 and I am here to ensure that you receive your funds as soon as possible. 
Having gone through your email to me, you have requested for some details proof of this transaction and I must let you know that you will definitely all that you have requested in due time.
Kindly be informed that the requested documents will be mailed to you and you will receive them at your door step. Note that we don't send important documents in email to avoid stealing them in the internet.  All you need to do is to provide us with your correct house address to enable us mail the documents to you. Also your contact phone number because I have tried calling your several times and could not reach you.
Note that the required Processing/Stamp Duty fee is $980 only and the cost of transfer fee is $2,700, making everything a total of $3,680 which you will pay before the transfer of your funds $10,500.000.
However, I will advice you to proceed as urgent as possible and make the payment to our receiving agent bank account given to you in my previous email and get back to me with the transfer payment receipt to enable us proceed and transfer your funds  to your bank account.  Be informed that as soon as the payment is received from you, there will be no other fee and we shall proceed and complete your transfer to your account without any further delay.

I hereby confirming to you that this transaction is 100% real, legal and legitimate and in accordance with international banking laws and will be transferred to your account immediately the required Processing/Stamp Duty fee of $980 only and the cost of transfer fee of $2,700 is received from you.
Once again, your contact phone number is not reachable, therefore you need to get back to us with your correct phone number and your contact address where the official documents will be mailed to.
The attached file is my working I.D.

Thanks,Mr. Jerome Powell
